ModMetaData.author: Emoryoakley (Exiler)
ModMetaData.description:
[b]Smaller Geothermal Generator (更小的地熱發電機)[/b]
[i]Version: 1.5-20250402[/i]
[url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator/blob/master/README.zh.md]繁體中文說明[/url] | [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator/blob/master/README.md]English README[/url]
[b]Introduction:[/b] This is a simple RimWorld mod that resized the vanilla geothermal generator, adding four new sizes: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, and 5x5.
To enhance realism in the game, the related values for the four new geothermal generators added in this mod, including power output, resources to make, max hit points, work to make, and required construction skill levels, have all been adjusted.
Apart from the values listed above, theoretically, all other building attributes or stats are consistent with the vanilla geothermal generator.
[b]How to Use?:[/b] Subscribe to or download this mod and enable it in the game. Complete the research "Geothermal Power" to unlock the four new geothermal generators.
Check below for detailed specifications of each generator:
[b]Mini Geothermal Generator (2x2)[/b] - Area: 4 Tiles - Power: 500 W - Power per Unit Area: 125 W/Tile - Resources to Make: 50 Steel, 2 Components - HP: 75 - Work to Make: 1500 - Construction Skill Required: 2
[b]Light Geothermal Generator (3x3)[/b] - Area: 9 Tiles - Power: 1000 W - Power per Unit Area: 111.1 W/Tile - Resources to Make: 120 Steel, 3 Components - HP: 175 - Work to Make: 3500 - Construction Skill Required: 3
[b]Medium Geothermal Generator (4x4)[/b] - Area: 16 Tiles - Power: 1800 W - Power per Unit Area: 112.5 W/Tile - Resources to Make: 200 Steel, 5 Components - HP: 300 - Work to Make: 6000 - Construction Skill Required: 5
[b]High-Efficient Geothermal Generator (5x5)[/b] - Area: 25 Tiles - Power: 2700 W - Power per Unit Area: 108 W/Tile - Resources to Make: 300 Steel, 7 Components - HP: 450 - Work to Make: 9000 - Construction Skill Required: 7
[b]Geothermal Generator (6x6) (Vanilla)[/b] - Area: 36 Tiles - Power: 3600 W - Power per Unit Area: 100 W/Tile - Resources to Make: 340 Steel, 8 Components - HP: 500 - Work to Make: 12000 - Construction Skill Required: 8
[b]Languages:[/b] This mod includes support for: - Traditional Chinese (繁體中文) - Simplified Chinese (简体中文) - English
You are welcome to develop and upload your own language translation mods.
[b]Compatibility and Notes:[/b] - This mod is known to be incompatible with the mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url]. - For more detailed information, please visit: [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator]GitHub Repo[/url]。
